text: Chaudhry Mohammad Sarwadit is a Pakistani politican From 1997 to 2010, he was a member of Parliament for Glasgow Central. He was the first Muslim politician in the United Kingdom.UK Politics: Vindication for UK's first Muslim MP BBC News In 2007, he said that he would not run for office again in Glasgow. From 2013 to 2015, and from 2018 to 2022 he was Governor of Punjab. == References == Category:British politicians Category:Pakistani politicians Category:1950 births
title: Chaudhry Mohammad Sarwar
